|Title=Know the characteristics of an epileptic and non-epileptic event (pseudo-seizure).

cf item 105

properties.question: Which of the following characteristics is NOT typically associated with a non-epileptic pseudo-seizure (pseudo-epileptic event)?
properties.option_a: Abrupt cessation of consciousness without warning
properties.option_b: Muscle rigidity followed by rhythmic jerking movements
properties.option_c: Responsiveness to verbal or physical stimuli during the event
